name: Is it clear enough for you?
name_original: Is it clear enough for you?
description:
You became a familiar-looking shadow with the power to control the light, use it to get around.

Use A/D or Arrow keys to walk, Space to jump. Grab and drag with the mouse to move the light around.

Music by マニーラ (https://dova-s.jp/bgm/play15246.html)
